name: Armstrong
tagline: We are Doers. We are Creative Technologists.
description:
Armstrong is a marketing technology company built on top of a digital agency. We develop marketing products and services that help brands define the new customer journey. Our social marketing platfom, adopt was recently cerfified Facebook Marketing Partner.
Armstrong's digital engineers work hand-in-hand with our agency’s marketers and strategists ; this strong alliance allows us to create brand experiences that are meaningful for both the consumer and our clients’ business
